simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR on error.
SSH_AGAIN, if the session is in nonblocking mode, and call must be done again.

briefdescription.para: Get the issue banner from the server.

detaileddescription.para: This is the banner showing a disclaimer to users who log in, typically their right or the fact that they will be monitored.

simplesect.para: A newly allocated string with the banner, NULL on error.

briefdescription.para: Get the version of the OpenSSH server, if it is not an OpenSSH server then 0 will be returned.

detaileddescription.para: You can use the SSH_VERSION_INT macro to compare version numbers.

simplesect.para: The version number if available, 0 otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Disconnect from a session (client or server). The session can then be reused to open a new session.
